name: Snyk Security
description: Integrate with Snyk Security to list, list, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Orgs
tools.description: List Snyk organizations that the authenticated user belongs to. Returns org names, slugs, and IDs.

tools.name: List Projects
tools.description: List Snyk projects within an organization. Returns project names, types, and last test dates.

tools.name: List Issues
tools.description: List Snyk issues (vulnerabilities) for a project within an organization. Returns issue titles, severities, and remediation info.

tools.name: Get Project
tools.description: Retrieve details of a specific Snyk project. Returns project name, type, origin, issue counts, and last test date.

tools.name: Test Package
tools.description: Test a package for known vulnerabilities using Snyk. Provide the ecosystem, package name, and version.
